Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering them unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in their own mind and unable to defend themselves. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing that foe to believe their friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack their own allies. If you Confuse someone before they have noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: Hypnotizes a group of foes at a distance and puts them to Sleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. This power deals no damage, but if done discreetly, the targets will never be aware of your presence. Recharge: Slow
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: You have been Hypnotized and cannot act.

Telekinesis.display_help: Lifts a foe, and any nearby foes, off the ground and repels them. The targets are helpless, unable to take action, and will continue to hover away, picking up any passing targets, as long as you keep this power active. Keeping up this level of concentration costs a lot of Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Telekinesis.display_short_help: Toggle: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Foe Hold, Repel
Telekinesis.display_target_help: You are being telekinetically held in place.

Total_Domination.display_help: Tears at the mind of a target foe and those near them. Dominate renders all affected foes helpless, lost in their own minds and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Long

Terrify.display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Mass_Confusion.display_help: You can cause Mass Confusion within a group of foes, creating chaos. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring all heroes. If you Confuse villains before they noticed you, your presence will continue to go unnoticed. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by Confused enemies. Recharge: Long
Mass_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.
